comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: And there is the "SS Orient" at her wharf. There are so many photos of her in the Tyrrell collection, that it seems she never left Sydney. www.flickr.com/search/?w=24785917@N03&q=ss+orient&... More info: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2362703683/

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Google street view is good from a point very near here, a panorama of the Bridge and Opera House - maps.google.com.au/maps?ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Sydney+...
